statements: SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yield_data WHERE planting_location = 'CA'
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM crop_yield_data WHERE crop_id > 3
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data WHERE yield_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT planting_date, planting_location FROM crop_yield_data ORDER BY planting_date DESC
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data WHERE yield_amount > 100 ORDER BY crop_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT crop_name, planting_location FROM crop_yield_data WHERE planting_date >= '2022-01-01' AND planting_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM crop_yield_data WHERE planting_location = 'California' ORDER BY planting_date ASC
SELECT DISTINCT crop_name FROM crop_yield_data WHERE planting_location = 'New York'
SELECT AVG(yield_amount) AS avg_yield FROM crop_yield_data WHERE planting_location = 'Texas' GROUP BY crop_name HAVING avg_yield > 75
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yield_data WHERE planting_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, yield_amount FROM crop_yield_data ORDER BY yield_amount DESC;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount, planting_date FROM crop_yield_data WHERE yield_amount > 1000;
SELECT trend_category, yield_increase, analysis_date FROM productivity_trends ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yield_data WHERE yield_amount > 100 ORDER BY crop_name DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data JOIN productivity_trends ON crop_yield_data.crop_name = productivity_trends.trend_category WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY crop_name, trend_category;
SELECT crop_name, AVG(yield_amount) AS average_yield FROM crop_yield_data GROUP BY crop_name HAVING COUNT(crop_id) > 1 ORDER BY average_yield DESC;
SELECT trend_category, COUNT(trend_id) AS trend_count FROM productivity_trends GROUP BY trend_category HAVING COUNT(trend_id) > 3 ORDER BY trend_count DESC;
SELECT crop_name, MAX(yield_amount) AS max_yield FROM crop_yield_data GROUP BY crop_name ORDER BY max_yield DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data;
SELECT crop_name, crop_yield FROM crop_yield_data WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT field_name, soil_type FROM field_data WHERE field_size > 100;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvesting_date FROM crop_yield_data ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, crop_id, productivity_score, analysis_date FROM productivity_analysis WHERE productivity_score > 80 ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data ORDER BY crop_name DESC, harvesting_date ASC;
SELECT crop_name, crop_yield, planting_date, harvesting_date FROM crop_yield_data WHERE crop_yield > 500 ORDER BY crop_yield DESC;
SELECT field_name, field_size, soil_type, crop_name FROM field_data JOIN crop_yield_data ON field_data.crop_id = crop_yield_data.crop_id WHERE soil_type = 'Clay' ORDER BY field_size ASC;

SELECT crop_name, productivity_score, planting_season FROM crop_yield_data JOIN productivity_analysis ON crop_yield_data.crop_id = productivity_analysis.crop_id WHERE productivity_score > 70 ORDER BY planting_date DESC;

SELECT analysis_id, crop_name, productivity_score, analysis_date FROM productivity_analysis JOIN crop_yield_data ON productivity_analysis.crop_id = crop_yield_data.crop_id WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY productivity_score DESC, analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yield_data WHERE yield_amount > 1000;
SELECT crop_name FROM crop_yield_data WHERE planting_date < '2022-01-01' AND harvest_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT season_name, yield_amount FROM planting_seasons ps JOIN productivity_analysis pa ON ps.season_id = pa.season_id WHERE yield_amount > 800;
SELECT analysis_id, crop_name, productivity_index FROM productivity_analysis pa JOIN crop_yield_data cyd ON pa.crop_id = cyd.crop_id WHERE productivity_index < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield_data ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM crop_yield_data WHERE yield_amount > 1000 ORDER BY yield_amount DESC;

SELECT analysis_id, crop_name, season_name, yield_amount, productivity_index FROM productivity_analysis INNER JOIN crop_yield_data ON productivity_analysis.crop_id = crop_yield_data.crop_id INNER JOIN planting_seasons ON productivity_analysis.season_id = planting_seasons.season_id WHERE productivity_index > 0.8 ORDER BY productivity_index DESC;
SELECT decision_id, decision_date, recommended_actions FROM decision_making WHERE decision_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(yield_amount) AS max_yield, MIN(yield_amount) AS min_yield, AVG(yield_amount) AS avg_yield FROM crop_yield_data;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yield WHERE yield_amount > 100;
SELECT id, planting_date FROM crop_yield ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT farm_name, city, state FROM farm_location WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT variety_name, crop_type, seed_company FROM crop_variety ORDER BY variety_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM crop_yield;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount FROM crop_yield WHERE planting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT farm_name, address, city, state, zip_code FROM farm_location ORDER BY city, state;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND precipitation < 5;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, crop_type FROM crop_yield JOIN crop_variety ON crop_yield.id = crop_variety.id;
